Real-time data integration platform

StreamDuo is a platform for B2B data integration. Stream data with your partners in real-time, using simple APIs.

Streaming

Exchange data with partners in real-time, for seamless operations.

Simple

Don't host a new API. We do the hard work of hosting, allowing you to use simple API clients and start exchanging data in minutes.

Secure

Granular management of authentication in the StreamDuo console gives you complete control over data access.

Request a Demo

Get a 1:1 introduction to what StreamDuo can do for you.

How it Works

With StreamDuo you write records to a private stream using simple APIs. Once you grant access to your partners, they can read those records using those same APIs.


A stream can be used as..

A Data Stream

The stream is ordered in time, and maintains a record of read status, allowing it to act as a streaming data source.



A Database

The stream tracks records by ID, allowing you to use it like a traditional database to read and write individual records.


Learn More About How it Works

Make Partnerships Happen

Don't let a partnership stall because the API build is in the backlog. With StreamDuo, you can establish data streaming in minutes, taking the friction out of partnerships integration.
